name: nephritis
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a condition in which the kidneys (= a pair of small organs in the body that take away waste matter from the blood to produce urine) become painful and swollen: She was diagnosed with a rare form of nephritis. He fell ill with Bright's disease, a kidney disease known today as nephritis.
More examplesFewer examplesThen I got nephritis, which kept me in bed for a month.She had a kidney transplant on Thursday after 10 years suffering from nephritis.Failure to treat severe nephritis can eventually lead to total kidney failure.
